description.narrative:
The projects proposed for financing under the requested PFR are:
1. Financing of the funding gap due to cost overrun in the Tongi-Bhairab Bazar Double Track subproject under the first tranche; 2. Rehabilitation of yards and extension of loops at different stations in the Darsana - Ishurdi - Sirajganj Bazar section; and 3. Upgrading of Signaling at 11 Stations between Ishurdi and Darsana. 4. Supervision Consultancy Services

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved railway transport capacity in the Dhaka-Chittagong and Dhaka-Ishurdi-Darsana-Khulna/India corridors

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Number of daily trains Tongi-Bhairab Bazar increased by 25% until 2020 (2011 baseline: 44 trains)
